ygData.subject: Re: PoG
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks a bunch for the advice. I had been wondering which factions to align with in Velious. Thusfar, I ve been camping in FM & OOT trying to build up the bank
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks a bunch for the advice. I had been
wondering which factions to align with in Velious. Thusfar,
I've been camping in FM & OOT trying to build up the
bank account & get quick exp. I'm 38 now (just dinged
last night) and am wondering where I should hunt after
I hit 39 (new spellz - Woot!) I'm pretty balanced
with all of my weapon skills at least 180, casting
skills are all pretty close to maxed as well.<br><br>Any
suggestions on where to hunt & what quests I should be
working on?<br><br>Thanks,<br>Tetzu <br>Morell-Thule
